00031 class RealBase: public Function {
00032     public:
00035         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> &function_type(double, double, double);
00037         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> raw_function_type (double, double, double);
00038 
00039         RealBase() { }
00040         RealBase(const QString &name,
00041                  double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00042                  double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00043                  double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00044                  ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap()):
00045                 Function(name, _parms),
00046                 tmin (_tmin), tmax (_tmax), dt (_dt),
00047                 umin (_umin), umax (_umax), du (_du),
00048                 vmin (_vmin), vmax (_vmax), dv (_dv),
00049                 tsteps (unsigned ((tmax-tmin)/dt+1)),
00050                 usteps (unsigned ((umax-umin)/du+1)),
00051                 vsteps (unsigned ((vmax-vmin)/dv+1)) { }
00052 
00053     protected:
00054         unsigned &getTsteps() { return tsteps; }
00055         unsigned getTsteps() const { return tsteps > 0? tsteps: 1; }
00056         unsigned &getUsteps() { return usteps; }
00057         unsigned getUsteps() const { return usteps > 0? usteps: 1; }
00058         unsigned &getVsteps()  { return vsteps; }
00059         unsigned getVsteps() const { return vsteps > 0? vsteps: 1; }
00060          
00061         double &getTmin() { return tmin; }
00062         double getTmin() const { return tmin; }
00063         double &getTmax() { return tmax; }
00064         double getTmax() const { return tmax; }
00065         double &getDt() { return dt; }
00066         const double &getDt() const { return dt; }
00067         double &getUmin() { return umin; }
00068         double getUmin() const { return umin; }
00069         double &getUmax() { return umax; }
00070         double getUmax() const { return umax; }
00071         double &getDu() { return du; }
00072         const double &getDu() const { return du; }
00073         double &getVmin() { return vmin; }
00074         double getVmin() const { return vmin; }
00075         double &getVmax() { return vmax; }
00076         double getVmax() const { return vmax; }
00077         double &getDv() { return dv; }
00078         const double &getDv() const { return dv; }
00079 
00081         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f(double, double, double) = 0;
00083 
00087         VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double t, double u, double v) {
00088             return f(t,u,v);
00089         }
00090 
00091     private:
00092         double tmin, 
00093                tmax, 
00094                dt,   
00095                umin, 
00096                umax, 
00097                du,   
00098                vmin, 
00099                vmax, 
00100                dv;   
00101         unsigned tsteps, 
00102                  usteps, 
00103                  vsteps; 
00104 };

00118 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00119     public:
00120         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00121                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00122                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00123                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00124                       ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap());
00125         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00126 
00127         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00128                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00129                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00130         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00131         virtual void Draw (void);
00132 
00133         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00134                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00135                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00136 
00137         virtual unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 3; }
00138 
00139     protected:
00140         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00141 
00142         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00143         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00144         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00145 
00146         virtual void Initialize (void);
00147         virtual void InitMem (void);
00148 
00149         vec4vec3D X,      
00150                   Xtrans; 
00151         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00152 
00153         VecMath::Vector<4> F;
00154 
00155 
00156 };

00158 
00159 /*******************************************************************************
00160  *
00161  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00162  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00163  *  but need not
00164  */
00165

00177 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00178     public:
00179         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00180                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00181                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00182                      double _rad = 1);
00183         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00184         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &);
00185 
00186     protected:
00187         virtual function_type f;
00188         virtual function_type normal;
00189 
00190         double Radius;
00191 };

00201 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00202     public:
00203         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00204                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00205                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00206                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00207         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00208         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00209     //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00210 #if 1
00211     for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin(); i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00212         if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius") R = double(*i->second);
00213         if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius") r = double(*i->second);
00214         if (i->second->getName() == "Micro Radius") rho = double(*i->second);
00215     }
00216 #else
00217     setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00218     setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00219     setParameter(parms, this->rho, "Micro Radius");
00220 #endif
00221 }
00222 
00223     protected:
00224         virtual function_type f;
00225 
00226         double R, r, rho;
00227 };

00235 class Torus2: public RealFunction {
00236     public:
00237         Torus2 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00238                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00239                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00240                 double _R = 1, double _r = 0.5);
00241         virtual ~Torus2 () { }
00242         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00243             //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00244 #if 1
00245             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00246                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00247                 if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius")
00248                     R = double(*i->second);
00249                 if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius")
00250                     r = double(*i->second);
00251             }
00252 #else
00253             setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00254             setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00255 #endif
00256         }
00257 
00258     protected:
00259         virtual function_type f;
00260 
00261         double R, r;
00262 };

00289 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00290     public:
00291         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00292                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00293                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00294                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00295         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00296         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00297 #if 1
00298             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00299                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00300                 if (i->second->getName() == "M") M = double(*i->second);
00301                 if (i->second->getName() == "R") R = double(*i->second);
00302             }
00303 #else
00304             setParameter(parms, this->M, "M");
00305             setParameter(parms, this->R, "R");
00306 #endif
00307         }
00308 
00309     protected:
00310         virtual function_type f;
00311 
00312         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00313                R;
00314 };

00366 class PolarSin: public RealFunction {
00367     public:
00368         PolarSin (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00369                   double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00370                   double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00371                   double _phase = 2);
00372         virtual ~PolarSin () { }
00373 
00374         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00375 #       if 1
00376             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00377                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00378                 if (i->second->getName() == "Phase") Phase = double(*i->second);
00379             }
00380 #       else
00381             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00382 #       endif
00383         }
00384 
00385     protected:
00386         virtual function_type f;
00387         double Phase;
00388 };
